### Origin

* CM automation "script": *[Docs](https://github.com/octoml/ck/blob/master/docs/list_of_automations.md#script)*

### Script workflow

  #### Meta: "deps" key

  #### customize.py: "preprocess" function

  #### Meta: "prehook_deps" key

  #### Native script (run.sh or run.bat)

  #### Meta: "posthook_deps" key

  #### customize.py: "postprocess" function

  #### Meta: "post_deps" key

___
### Usage

#### CM installation
[Guide](https://github.com/mlcommons/ck/blob/master/docs/installation.md)

#### CM script help
```cm run script --help```

#### CM CLI
`cm run script --tags="get,src,source,power,power-dev,mlperf,mlcommons"`

*or*

`cm run script "get src source power power-dev mlperf mlcommons"`

*or*

`cm run script 72aa56768c994bcf`

#### CM Python API

```python
import cmind

r = cmind.access({'action':'run'
                  'automation':'script',
                  'tags':'get,src,source,power,power-dev,mlperf,mlcommons'
                  'out':'con'})

if r['return']>0:
    print (r['error'])
```
